f(x, y) := 1 + 3x + 7y + 10xy

f(0,0) = 1 + 0 + 0 + 0 = 1
f(0,1) = 1 + 0 + 7 + 0 = 8
f(1,0) = 1 + 3 + 0 + 0 = 4
f(1,1) = 1 + 3 + 7 + 10 = 21

C_1= 1 + 8 + 4 + 21 = 34

r_1 = 19213748471089898023728230496620603776074374349975485565540005809384893166327

g_1 = (1 + 3x + 7*0 + 10*x*0) + (1 + 3x + 7*1 + 10*x*1) = (1 + 3x) + (8 + 13x)  = 9 + 16x
g_2 = (1 + 3*19213748471089898023728230496620603776074374349975485565540005809384893166327 + 7*y + 10 * 19213748471089898023728230496620603776074374349975485565540005809384893166327 * y) = 
57641245413269694071184691489861811328223123049926456696620017428154679498982 + 192137484710898980237282304966206037760743743499754855655400058093848931663277y
